name: RANSACGlobalRegistration
description: Register two point clouds together with a feature matching based on RANSAC.

inputParameters.name: i_recompute
inputParameters.description: Connect a button to recompute the registration.

inputParameters.name: i_radius_kd_search
inputParameters.description: The radius used to search for neighbors in the KDTree.it is expressed relative to the point cloud size (0.01 means radiusKDTreeSearch = 1% of maxSize(pointCloud). It is used for the calculation of FPFHFeatures.

inputParameters.name: i_neighbours_kd_search
inputParameters.description: The maximum number of neighbors to search for in the KDTree. It is used for the calculation of FPFHFeatures. A higher value will result in heavier computation but potentially more precise.

inputParameters.name: i_max_corrspondence_dist
inputParameters.description: The maximum distance between correspondences. A higher value will result in more correspondences, but potentially include wrong ones.

inputParameters.name: is_t_estimate_pt2pt
inputParameters.description: If true it deforms the cloud to match. The transformation estimation method to use. By default, it uses a point to point transformation estimation. If true it will scale and deform the cloud.

inputParameters.name: i_ransac_n
inputParameters.description: The number of points to sample in the source point cloud. A higher value can result in a more precise transformation, but will take more time to compute.

inputParameters.name: i_checker_dist
inputParameters.description: The maximum distance between correspondances in the FPFH space before testing a RanSaC model. It is exprimed in relative values (it is scaled by the size of the bounding box of the poinnt cloud).

inputParameters.name: i_similarity_threshold
inputParameters.description: The threshold for the ransac check based on edge length to consider a model as inlier. A higher value will be stricter, discarding more ransac models.

inputParameters.name: i_max_iterations
inputParameters.description: The maximum number of iterations to run the Ransac algorithm. A higher value will take more time to compute but increases the chances of finding a good transformation.

inputParameters.name: i_confidence_threshold
inputParameters.description: The threshold for the convergence criteria of the ransac models. A higher value will be stricter, discarding more ransac models.
